response.original_title: Richard Smallwood with Vision: Persuaded - Live In D.C.
response.overview: Recorded in front of a capacity crowd of 10,000 gospel fans—with almost two and a half hours of music and ministry—this fully-orchestrated concert brought down the house!
response.tagline: Recorded in April 2001 at the megachurch Jericho City Of Praise in Washington DC
response.title: Richard Smallwood with Vision: Persuaded - Live In D.C.
